mil4.6:1.1: Thero “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā dasa upāsakassa upāsakaguṇe paridīpesi.
mil4.6:1.3: Katame dasa, idha, mahārāja, upāsako saṅghena samānasukhadukkho hoti, dhammādhipateyyo hoti, yathābalaṁ saṁvibhāgarato hoti, jinasāsanaparihāniṁ disvā abhivaḍḍhiyā vāyamati.
mil4.6:1.4_0: Sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, apagatakotūhalamaṅgaliko jīvitahetupi na aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddisati,
mil4.6:1.4_1: kāyikavācasikañcassa rakkhitaṁ hoti, samaggārāmo hoti samaggarato, anusūyako hoti,
mil4.6:1.4_2: na ca kuhanavasena sāsane carati, buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti, dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato
mil4.6:1.5_0: Ime kho, mahārāja, dasa upāsakassa upāsakaguṇā, te sabbe guṇā tayi saṁvijjanti, taṁ
mil4.6:1.5_1: te yuttaṁ pattaṁ anucchavikaṁ patirūpaṁ yaṁ tvaṁ jinasāsanaparihāniṁ disvā abhivaḍḍhiṁ
mil4.6:1.5_2: icchasi, karomi te okāsaṁ, puccha maṁ tvaṁ yathāsukhan”ti.
